title: help
content: i didn't leave the house all day. the sun never came up. no one is responding to my texts or calls and i can't get any live content from the web. my phone says it's 4am now so there's been no daylight for over 24 hours. i peeked outside again because i heard footsteps but there was still no one out there. except, it was brighter than it has been. it looked like moonlight. i checked a few windows until i could see the moon. it's not right. it's... i don't know how to say this but... there are two moons, big and bright. white like eyes.
